accommodation.name: Station Lodge
accommodation.description: Station Lodge offers quality affordable accommodation in Ohakune, adjacent to the Tongairio National Park, looking out towards Mt Ruapehu.

accommodation.name: Ohakune-Matata
accommodation.description: You'll feel right at home here. My house has everything you need to relax in comfort after a day hiking, skiing or biking. The spacious open plan living with electric fireplace and dining area are all within reach of the modern equipped kitchen.

accommodation.name: Alexander Spa Motel
accommodation.description: Clean self contained motel units located in a quiet street off SH4 50 minutes from Whakapapa

accommodation.name: Ohakune Homestay
accommodation.description: Our rooms at the Ohakune Homestay have rural views and all are appointed with their own en-suites

accommodation.name: YHA Ohakune
accommodation.description: YHA Ohakune backpacker hostel has been lovingly restored yet retains its unique and historical character.

accommodation.name: Tongariro Springs Boutique Suites
accommodation.description: Tongariro Springs is small private accommodation beside Tongariro National Park. Ideally placed for the Tongariro Alpine Crossing, the Northern Circuit and the Mount Ruapehu Ski Season. Our scenic outdoor Hot Pool & Spa Pool are as unique as we are.

accommodation.name: Tussock Grove Boutique Hotel
accommodation.description: Tussock Grove Boutique Hotel is the ideal place to stay in the Central North Island.  The Hotel features a large, welcoming lounge complete with log fire, as well as 8 comfortable, two-storey rooms, all with en-suite bathrooms, and tea/coffee making facilities

accommodation.name: Rocky Mountain Chalets
accommodation.description: Ohakune’s luxurious and affordable chalet accommodation.

accommodation.name: Spiral Gardens B & B
accommodation.description: Welcome to Spiral Gardens B&B. We offer three luxury suites in our bed and breakfast option and a small studio cabin in our self contained option.

accommodation.name: Kakahi Adventure Lodge
accommodation.description: Kakahi Adventure Lodge is a spacious, sunny and warm homestead, fully equipped for you to come home too after your central north island adventure.

accommodation.name: Junction House
accommodation.description: Junction House is the perfect place to stay if your  bringing children or pets with you. A fully fenced backyard and babysitting and doggy daycare both available.  Breakfast included in the rate, linen also included.

accommodation.name: Pipers Lodge
accommodation.description: Pipers Lodge is a family owned and operated business designed to accommodate families,groups or individuals. We have an in-house bar and dining area for breakfasts and dinner. Ski hire,games room and 3 spa pools for your comfort.

accommodation.name: Alexander Spa Motel
accommodation.description: Clean self contained motel units located in a quiet street off SH4 50 minutes from Whakapapa

accommodation.name: Timber Trail Lodge
accommodation.description: Deep in the centre of Aotearoa's North Island, right in the middle of nowhere, is a very special place. The Timber Trail Lodge, at the mid-point of NZ's best two-day cycle trail, offers boutique, fully serviced accommodation.

accommodation.name: Tongariro Crossing Lodge
accommodation.description: Tongariro Crossing Lodge is a family-run lodge in National Park Village

accommodation.name: Whanganui River Adventures - Pipiriki Cottage
accommodation.description: Pipiriki Cottage - only accommodation in Pipiriki sleeping up to 7 persons. Self catering and linen is provided.

accommodation.name: Wildside Getaway
accommodation.description:
Wildside Getaway is a modern, self-sufficient home on a 350 acre native
bush property, with inspirational views of Mount Ruapehu & Mount
Taranaki. This is the perfect getaway for families and groups looking
for a New Zealand outdoors experience.

accommodation.name: Pipers Lodge
accommodation.description: Pipers Lodge is a family owned and operated business designed to accommodate families,groups or individuals. We have an in-house bar and dining area for breakfasts and dinner. Ski hire,games room and 3 spa pools for your comfort.

accommodation.name: Raetihi Holiday Park & Cabins
accommodation.description: Perfectly located in the Central North Island, we offer affordable accommodation, with communal facilities.

accommodation.name: Plateau Lodge
accommodation.description: Located on the edge of a Dual World Heritage site - 'Tongariro National Park', is Plateau Lodge & Shuttles. We offer accommodation and the only Tongariro campsites right in the village. With a backdrop of the Tongariro volcanoes, our lodge covers a wide range of family friendly apartments, ensuite rooms and lodge rooms.

accommodation.name: The Crossing Backpackers
accommodation.description: We have budget accommodation with a variety of room types to suit family, friends and individuals alike.

accommodation.name: Pipiriki Camping Ground
accommodation.description: Whanganui River Adventures owns and operates Pipiriki Camping Grounds. Home away from Home, very affordable. Secure with stunning bush scenery.

accommodation.name: Tongariro Suites @ The Rocks
accommodation.description: Located on the edge of Tongariro National Park, Tongariro Suites offers Premium Boutique Accommodation. Every one of our four suites has stunning Mt Ruapehu views. Opened in March 2014 we offer fresh and modern accommodation in the Ohakune region.

accommodation.name: Rocky Mountain Chalets
accommodation.description: Ohakune’s luxurious and affordable chalet accommodation.

accommodation.name: Uncle Bill's Cottage
accommodation.description: Uncle Bill's Cottage is a beautifully restored cottage, set beside the river and tucked away in a valley rich in history. It's the perfect place for relaxing with family or friends, and a fabulous base for skiing, tramping, jetboating or biking.

accommodation.name: The Hobbit Motorlodge
accommodation.description: The Hobbit Motorlodge is a charming, purpose built alpine lodge and motel complex.

accommodation.name: Plateau Lodge

With a backdrop of the Tongariro volcanoes, our lodge covers a wide range of family friendly apartments, ensuite rooms and lodge rooms.

accommodation.name: Alpine Motel Lodge

accommodation.name: Powderhorn Chateau Ohakune
accommodation.description: Combining all the facilities of a great hotel with the ambience of a friendly lodge.

accommodation.name: Mountain Heights Lodge
accommodation.description: Mountain Heights Lodge provides excellent, quality accommodation options including bed and breakfast and motel or self contained units for travellers wishing to stay in the Mt Ruapehu and Tongariro region.

accommodation.description: Ohakune’s luxurious and affordable chalet accommodation. Rocky Mountain Chalets is a premium alpine-style resort consisting of 42 beautifully appointed stand-alone chalets.

accommodation.name: The River Lodge
accommodation.description: With breathtaking views of Mount Ruapehu and set in world heritage national parks, join us at The River Lodge and experience the essence of this unique location in comfort and style.

accommodation.name: Adventure Lodge & Motel
accommodation.description: Situated in a quiet location off the main highway in National Park Village, Adventure Lodge and Motel offers free Wi-Fi access.

accommodation.name: Ruapehu Chalet Rentals
accommodation.description: Need accommodation? At Ruapehu Chalet Rentals, we have a large selection of chalets and/or holiday houses that are all available for rental. Stay a week or a weekend.

accommodation.name: Omaka Lodge
accommodation.description: Situated only 7km from the friendly township of Taumarunui, down the incredible Forgotten World Highway, lies Omaka Lodge, a boutique bed & breakfast venue in the heart of New Zealand’s Forgotten World.

accommodation.name: Bridge to Nowhere Lodge - Whanganui River
accommodation.description: Bridge to Nowhere Lodge is a unique place. Located deep in the Whanganui National Park wilderness region, we are the only Whanganui River accommodation of this kind in the area. There are no roads to us, access is by our jet boat or canoeing.

accommodation.name: Country View Cottage
accommodation.description: We provide comfortable affordable bed and breakfast accommodation at Country View Cottage in Taumarunui in the heart of the Ruapehu Area.

accommodation.name: Awatea Chalet
